Title: Hold high the great red banner of Mao Zedong Thought to wage the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution to the end - Revolution is no crime, to rebel is justified
Designer: Revolutionary Rebel Command of the Shanghai Publishing System (上海出版系统革命司令部)Revolutionary Rebel Committee of the Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House (上海人民美术出版社革命造反委员会)
Notes: Text on the armbands: Rebel team - 造反隊 (simplified 造反队), Zaofan dui.
